Package sailpoint.api

Class IdentityService

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.api.IdentityService
  • public class IdentityService
extends java.lang.Object
    A service layer that deals with identities.

      • getLinks

        public java.util.List<Link> getLinks​(Identity identity,
                                     int start,
                                     int limit)
                              throws GeneralException
        Get a range of links for an Identity. (ordered by application.name)
        Parameters:
        identity - The identity to get links for
        start - The start value
        limit - The maximum number of links to return. (if zero all links are returned)
        Returns:
        a range of links for an Identity. (ordered by application.name)
        Throws:
        GeneralException

        public java.util.List<Link> getLinks​(Identity identity,
                                     Application application,
                                     java.lang.String instance)
                              throws GeneralException
        Returns a list of Links for the given identity on the given application and instance.
        Parameters:
        identity - The identity whose links should be searched
        application - The application to search with.
        instance - The application instance to search with.
        Returns:
        Non-null list of Link objects returned from the search.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

                                     Application application)
                              throws GeneralException
        Returns all the links from the Identity for the given Application.
        Parameters:
        identity - The identity whose links should be searched
        application - The application to search with.
        Returns:
        Non-null List of Link objects if found. Otherwise an empty list will be returned.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getLink

        public Link getLink​(Identity identity,
                    Application application,
                    ResourceObject obj)
             throws GeneralException
        Gets a link for the specified resource object.
        Parameters:
        identity - The identity whose links should be searched
        application - The application to search with.
        obj - The resource object to search with. The identity, uuid and instance propertied are used in the search.
        Returns:
        Matching Link object if found.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getLink

        public Link getLink​(Identity identity,
                    Application application,
                    java.lang.String instance,
                    java.lang.String nativeIdentity)
             throws GeneralException
        Retrieves the link from the identity with the given application, instance and native identity.
        Parameters:
        identity - The identity to search for. Must be non-null
        application - The application to search for. Must be non-null
        instance - The application instance to search for. Nullable.
        nativeIdentity - The native identity to search for. Must be non-null
        Returns:
        The Link with the given information.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getLink

        public Link getLink​(Identity identity,
                    Application application,
                    java.lang.String instance,
                    java.lang.String nativeIdentity,
                    java.lang.String uuid)
             throws GeneralException
        Retrieves the link from the identity with the given application, instance, native identity, and uuid.
        Parameters:
        identity - The identity to search for. Must be non-null
        application - The application to search for. Must be non-null
        instance - The application instance to search for. Nullable.
        nativeIdentity - The native identity to search for. Must be non-null
        uuid - The uuid of the Kubj,
        Returns:
        The Link with the given information.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

        Returns:

      • getIdentitySuggestQueryOptions

        public QueryOptions getIdentitySuggestQueryOptions​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​?> requestParams,
                                                   Identity loggedInUser)
                                            throws GeneralException
        Return QueryOptions used to filter Identities using the given request parameters and loggedInUser.
        Parameters:
        requestParams - A Map of the HTTP request parameters.
        loggedInUser - The logged in user.
        Returns:
        The QueryOptions used to filter Identities using the given info.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getDelegationRecipientSuggestQueryOptions

        public static QueryOptions getDelegationRecipientSuggestQueryOptions​(SailPointContext context,
                                                                     java.lang.String certificationItemId,
                                                                     java.lang.String query)
                                                              throws GeneralException
        Return QueryOptions used to filter Identities for delegating. Cannot include the target of the cert item, nor any workgroups the owner of the cert item is a member of (unless of course they have the appropriate rights). This is called in a BeanShell script from the DelegationRecipient IdentitySelectorConfiguration.
        Parameters:
        context - Sailpoint context
        certificationItemId - The id of the certification item
        query - The query string we are searching for
        Returns:
        The QueryOptions used to filter Identities using the given info.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getIdentityFromIdOrName

        public Identity getIdentityFromIdOrName​(java.lang.String id,
                                        java.lang.String name)
                                 throws GeneralException
        Get the identity object associated with the id if possible, otherwise gets an object by the name passed in.
        Parameters:
        id - the id to look up the object by
        name - the name to use if id doesn't work
        Returns:
        the identity based on the parameters
        Throws:
        GeneralException - if Identity is not found throws an exception

        Returns:
